name: Rohan Singh
warning_signs: Decreased urine output or dark-colored urine
follow_up_instructions: Restrict fluid intake to 1.5 liters per day
Weigh yourself daily and report sudden weight gain (>2 lbs in 24 hours)
discharge_summary:
Patient Rohan Singh was admitted on 2025-09-03 with Diabetic Nephropathy. 
During hospitalization, patient was managed with Insulin glargine 20 units at bedtime, Calcitriol 0.25mcg daily, Metoprolol 50mg twice daily. 
Procedures performed included Kidney biopsy, Arteriovenous fistula creation, Blood transfusion.
Patient's condition improved and was stable at discharge. 
Discharged home with instructions to follow up with nephrologist and continue medications as prescribed. 
Patient educated on warning signs and dietary restrictions.
